text.text:
faida
a tysw
holl y̅lit mir̅
Enyᵗ & ne
ben̅ giᵗ lotht
ben ebey̅
tolg
ny̅ ben & ben ne var̅re breaᵗ er ord [marginal ?]
o Ȝoyn̅ he ben i̅ tessi
co Ȝoyn̅ hir̅
ben se di ven & ȝa̅tone he acht
oyrt ben bi doil Eacht a che̅nyᵗ
er rair̅ chraa // is marg id taa rnir̅ I teig
lirg a Ȝail na lea marg na feadi
id tagg nnis pen̅ ne heik ca
da lawryᵗ y̅ neigᵗ na ven roe merg

voll
nyni ny̅ vane gi̅ tathi ȝa
ȝyr̅ is fa ȝai Keil
is toyth vrrinn choir̅ di vac
dur̅rin er ȝolle ȝlan mi che
hi̅ny̅ er mave myrvael da ȝrinni tall
dovir̅ mac ag fin an r̅ac i̅ gom chotchin
ȝilli g͘oyᵗ motery elli ag tyl ynni alve
i̅ vil aggit so ȝwle layᵗ tyl
dolb i̅ ny̅ intin chaa i̅ aa
ossin vor̅ vᶜ fin na chilt
cheive er chalmyᵗ
ȝe chonni sloe celli na
ey bog twle stom faa Kayv g
g agis a velli agis Eaiᵗ
corle fin na ni sloye
higidd̅ er ȝolle
cha chellmyn̅ gnew chan̅ g
na flling jar̅ri a ȝwle vor̅
gin lagga di ra
lac͘ so di corle er ȝyr̅ a ȝwle s
le con̅e ga gor̅ ne

Digir̅ no cha̅ nay no
cha nayir̅ i̅ er foß hugis ȝi royn a roßg
ead ȝleg i̅ gla Eaid is awȝlig a riß
a weil hugit is woyd be cut agga gi
cut doe droᵗ hang dane is drong eale chwnl
boyn deve brey borb gi rosk gorm is galde
y̅ beit i̅ vir facȝheis is naᵗ lerggit seiß i̅
cut agga crawa ceive leß naᵗ dry̅ neicht
chynni er i̅ deggow ead beg ȝa dugi Keale
drammi hoßdi du̅ ni mna̅w̅e̅ naᵗ fadyr̅ do ȝ
dram howaldi ȝeive poß is lowne gi mor̅ wll
fa mna̅w̅e̅ der̅rir̅ vle rew sin di crag ne vl
ach ba̅nisg i̅ do drane i̅ vil sorre is schear̅
gi Invin laid cheal how ne hay ȝoo ȝi rowm
deey̅ a ȝin lawriᵗ fir̅ seißa a le̅aᵗȝ
Na kneist ȝvrnner doyn gin veskga
faa vlaß di var̅re sangi aß sin oir̅sen

Invin toe lawe ȝouyȝhe ir nail vlli er a hi̅
Ȝark a low lawe ȝouȝhe o St. horch̅ clar̅
lawe rain ne roymmi er lawe vonyᵗ done deir̅ri [marginal ?]
[marginal sic] Lawe mi ȝaldi bert vra̅ neiᵗw a̅ new o chaiᵗa c
Lawe rayg er nor̅ virt voyniᵗ lawe hug mor̅ toᵗrvirt
Lawe mi ȝaldi deil daive mi ȝunyᵗ suevo
We er no lave loyan̅ sal ȝa hanyᵗ di ȝayvin
Invyn leynnyᵗ i̅ laive allin nawra ayr̅rin tal
Lawe E waiȝon vyir̅ri lawe bi chaiᵗ y̅ir̅ in nir̅rit
Hug leith oynnyᵗ er mawryᵗ i̅ nalve dyir̅ er i̅

Gerroid Erla etc.
Faalligan beg failligan magnyᵗ feyn i̅ gulligan
[marginal ? so] Is sa i̅ tur̅ri mi va̅nigane me̅ roiᵗ bakka [marginal ?]
Achaie mᶜihse̅ dudigane ayᵗ reim er grattegane [marginal ?]
[marginal is blank] gi ban chassil chwlligan fa hattala mi
var̅ri veyiᵗ oir̅rigane fa wair̅ ni verigane
roive maa er noeif neivgane es neir̅ g
ffailligane

Cor̅ faiᵗw er olswe albin sche nyedin ȝve gi maid
Mass lann lave a cheym i̅ g̅ gaif̅ in dem̅ ella ead
Necor̅feig in duß gyᵗ agyᵗ ga clwne̅ ni naᵗ ne nac͘ doe
Niyr̅ hac͘ gyᵗ raa reyve in negre ne maᵗ keyel gy̅ regryᵗ chor̅
In tyvyr̅ fa ville myᵗ hachre ne math glor̅ gin keel re coß
a ta bree in dane̅ a na ny̅sk de chem ta ȝa hynsa noß
Ac so geil di clinn ȝalt̅ ag rair̅ fille farda a ȝna
ga ta misse er dail o wrou̅w is Kist dawe is ollewai
one̅ Stewart a ceith ra̅nyᵗ a lave geil is far̅ boe
Gawe a leith is solt in gaga leith volt & bagre voym̅
hangiß tuggit vᶜßr robert a one̅ Stewart ny̅ rosk gorm̅
ber̅ a claa naᵗ my̅ fa weyir̅ braa is sin de ȝ͘eyr orm̅
Ffeya mir̅ a tacta mᵗam abbin romßa a ȝeil naᵗ me̅ morn̅
[marginal sic] ahur̅ war̅ ȝask ȝegni len̅ ane̅ nast caddna om orn̅
Gaf di ry vᶜßr Robert tallyᵗ rvuma ga beg mi hort
na how tyr̅ laye̅ y̅ loggir̅ is me i̅ vir̅ clair̅ coggi ort
Maß se di corle vone bea gy̅ etta a olta rea
A lawe rane̅ ny̅ geil so̅nw fa sayn nir̅ eir̅ id chonw ai
A chocullin clynna ȝalt ̾ one̅ lair̅ nor̅ wer̅ nort sorve
A lat is trane gnwß yre calle ne yȝane cuß falle orve
Ne we toe er hoon na er her̅rin gy̅ eir̅ lbvmsa a lacht taal
Na ha̅nit lai i̅ nai̅b alt na̅ i̅ tayt ȝavi̅ ȝra̅ta ȝareg [marginal ?]
Ne wee myr̅ a ȝomon tallyᵗ ga deggir̅ linn dulfou̅ fon noß
Ach for̅ er i̅ vaid eir̅ a bagre din vaid dein id taggit foß
De arsyᵗ ruttis vᶜßr robert ageil naᵗ crein vin croyve
ffa mow i̅ dee ȝut mi hegwail na see agis beggan doise
gna bi tußa a hollis orrim neve ny̅ merneir̅ ney̅ goggi sorve
[marginal ?] is far̅ ȝut gi rvo ȝail won tegna na ȝawal myr̅ er̅ri orve
ga ȝani me mir is coßwil di chanyᵗ ma̅ß dowryᵗ lynn
[marginal #] beg/in faich mi vart ra veich a thraieᵗ lat y̅ geyl grinn
beg in gyil dwß syt rair̅ neir̅re marru̅nse fa heyrik chronn
beg a wree gi mak ag maiyr̅ a heil slat o chaac͘ choonn
Ne ha͘wil sen̅id ta suß vᶜcaltyr̅ is far̅ Kyil
A laiwe thrayn̅ o Inni i̅ doyn naᵗ dar̅ filli royn̅m reyvi
Macth mi ȝyil remyᵗ ȝeymma orrit di heve Stheddais solsa [marginal x]
[marginal x] Di ȝai woß myr̅ eilla gin wrail si chossa nar̅ ymma teac͘ ȝoyle
[marginal ?] loir̅ nave mo hang͘a gín ȝressit marg a ȝreissyᵗ ne reim binn
A ȝaid is gal rowne̅ na is gar̅ is far gin sow nar̅resinna

Dunca͘ Mᶜ cowle veil
[marginal ?] MilevinMarvin woyme gow o̅one MᶜKnessȝil challen chamboil
[marginal ?] Da chree chim oß gyᵗ fir bea choiᵗ aggis marvyn

ard̅ la rechta gow re brawin ny̅ brow ȝin
Glaß in broein nalle nalin wleye veindone
Naw ra danyᵗ na̅ ra schemhis is dolta ȝonyᵗ
Nan ra seir̅syᵗ a chrayin gi gelyᵗ gi bar̅ boclyᵗ
Nan ra gronyᵗ na̅ ra seimmyᵗ na sechna ba̅nale
dolt ȝa cheyve cla̅ or nar ear̅ a̅eawe
ra cardyᵗ na̅ ra crossanyᵗ winni voyneiᵗ
dolb gow oorork royᵗin de cort choe
[marginal ?] Glaß see crossanyᵗ myᵗ chardsyᵗ ne eard owyr̅
chmyt la freiᵗ ir wyvir̅ gow leiᵗ lovmeiᵗ
[marginal sic]aa ta /miß y̅ crossane ag oochowee ny̅ golk scharryᵗ [marginal ?]
Sgyr̅ ba bar̅ bren nyᵗ broenyᵗ teyg nyᵗ tawryᵗ
Teyg ni tewraᵗ Teyg teive oylleiᵗ id ta i̅ nuht [marginal ?]
Trur̅ nar̅ chur̅ i̅ nannyᵗt er eltew carriᵗ cwmhir̅ [marginal ?]
Agis car cw̅bir̅ In car coerawyr̅ cloeᵗ wea in go [marginal ?]
cho̅ chowir̅ vᶜneß Agis in lae fail finni hawryᵗ hug
er twß in neyrin Agis di weeᵗ in vastenyᵗ var̅ cha
ᵗ gesga cloᵗ dy̅neiᵗ clothewsey̅ fa oororf s in
reiᵗ ffy̅ bea cogew neyve mor̅reiᵗ gy̅ nail eilli
beiᵗ sail is cart ni branyᵗ i̅ glak/ ni greive
nacht leawdens clynni nail daa drenale̅
ʅEnyᵗ i̅ lem er lenni di neiᵗ neillim er i̅
[marginal ?] hor̅ le toya y̅ deiskirdi dywassi dalchenyᵗ Da
[marginal d] chee gra̅monyᵗ ȝanyᵗ ir a chur̅ wyir̅ aa [marginal ?]
Deichiᵗ gyᵗ ha̅wallir dyᵗ na hy̅ ȝryma ra na
Dwnni i̅ dew fateiᵗ nyᵗ feilly̅ni / ne mir̅ sen di
oorork a choggi er nyᵗ cogreiᵗchew aᵗ i̅ gaß
Storaᵗyᵗ agis i̅ machir̅ra dilonni̅ ga agis ta̅nallyᵗ
Aewsetha dettyᵗ wor̅ di chor woß a gemni d
Di chon̅a fey a fei dy̅ney ella
Di chon̅a na fei a fwnnyᵗ er meye me̅ nyᵗ
Di hor̅ oorok ceach is cor̅ra teach is te̅nyᵗ
Teggiß gor̅ra gir ȝawe oorork it deil da
Gill glassyᵗ galyᵗ geylyᵗ nawnyᵗ maryᵗ

Idta fane̅ tullyᵗ so toye mᶜveckowle is croy coll [marginal x]
[marginal ?] Mᶜdadȝeul ne y̅ in derk naᵗ tug ra erk brayar̅ borb
Id ta fane̅ tullyᵗ so deß mᶜvekgoyne̅ Kaneß myr̅ wlae
Cha dar̅ sai nac͘ fa neiᵗ in greß noᵗ char̅ veine̅ yᵗ lawe
Id ta fo tullyᵗ hoirryᵗ oßgyr̅ bi vac͘ gol is gneyᵗ
Clan morn gai mac͘ ni fir noᵗ char̅ chur̅ sai sen i̅ breiᵗ
Id ta fa tullyᵗ so har̅ gillyᵗ bi van leß nyᵗ manaie
[marginal soo] Mᶜrorane̅ dar̅ weyᵗ clair̅ fane̅ tellyᵗ soo soy har̅ It ta [marginal x]
Id ta fane̅ twllyᵗ so foyme̅ Innar̅ vyᵗ von groik is gra [marginal x]
Con̅na̅ dyᵗ ȝoif gyᵗ murn fa tullyᵗ fume̅ Id ta Id ta

A hud̅ so Dunca͘ Campbel etc
ffadda o walle dea na ma̅c ne henyᵗ rayᵗ i̅ ba gyᵗ holk
O hawd re millyᵗ gyᵗ sloye o eßroye gow hy̅nis ork
O chapud fenis mo ȝeß guß yᵗ verve byᵗ wreß cuvroe [marginal curm ?]
Ne el oibven no ben lai riß nor̅ y̅po dea ȝrwne̅
N yrriß awyier̅ nir̅ gow hirris dyᵗ chraᵗ mᶜroye
Ne elliᵗ ben sne royve reyve fuac͘ da walle dea fane
chadwin dyᵗ wallyᵗ dea eaw nir̅ vai s
[marginal C?] threid mir̅ varle y̅ wen doyᵗ aw i̅ se̅nor troy [marginal ?]
Da bi ben roiᵗ eawe and ath gai dossyᵗ byᵗ clai [marginal ?]
he ȝyᵗ walle ȝyᵗ dea ath ven dyᵗ we a er deß [marginal ?]
Woo ta mna malleiᵗ reyve is dyᵗ ȝoyne̅ dea gyᵗ b
Is myr̅ sen dyᵗ naᵗ gor̅ ȝin bi gane̅ deggiß ne el s owalle de [marginal ?]

Ahoud̅ so Gerroid erle
Tor is ste ȝrolan veg & corteiᵗ feine̅ dyᵗ neit
Diᵗ varin dut cluk ny̅ gail naᵗ dany̅ falliᵗ ort [marginal x]
a how feine̅ oglyevor̅ na ka teir̅ aß ville dyᵗ ly
so a how yᵗ cla̅nyᵗ ny glann nor̅ higgin i̅ nawle er heiᵗ
MᶜVek me Vorth nᶜVrane̅ nor ellyᵗ reyve meßk gawlt
Nar̅ wein is teir̅ hor̅ is dem ȝerryᵗ treaᵗ ny̅ dorryᵗ Tar

Ahoud̅ so Dunca͘ Mor̅ o daly etc.
Draane̅ one̅ Invin faiᵗ ir gordyᵗ chin gyᵗ ane lai
[marginal i] ne is tole reid niᵗ haith er gayiᵗ ir gor̅ orrgill
[marginal i] Ir Ville ir ver̅ dan quhoy ȝore oddail yᵗ
[marginal ?] Tore chwlle dyᵗ hoare in tellow is ne ȝoyᵗ vlli dane̅ lon
[marginal ?] A chalane̅ is croye lam crey ʅ ye clannyᵗ curkeiᵗ
yᵗ er naik a day ayne̅ da vorkyᵗ ȝe yk in drayane̅
Drayane̅

fynn o'Daly
[marginal ?] Hark maillis mvrn in theil gar̅ wiris boig esy vor̅yny
Mark noth reoche vin E er reein droth heil dekry
[marginal ?] fflavonß mor̅ ar mvrn̅ vyg bea heyr̅ er hal ȝerryᵗ
Treeksin dee as deinoy an dail er ree ȝemon i̅ doynan̅
A ȝeyna ȝa dalt̅ rath leß naᵗ beg maid ir myriᵗ
ffyr̅ soig i̅ swna as sloir̅ leif gy̅ soig is sulle ȝaksin
Soig na soigrade neoyf at ta foaß fan̅ teyrg̅e
gach soig fa neyf sacha sin es baa yr̅ in noywy
Da ȝa rwyg sen ag so skail vo̅nis riß di rair̅ eyr̅ane̅
[marginal sic] Scail a traay̅ byntor noif ga baa Strystour̅ vor̅ streif
[marginal ? B] Sen torrath ar ag toagar bradda de wee in pusone fe̅nidda
[marginal ? B] Sair̅rir̅ ȝi chad ȝee ny̅ nwle la la̅nof beg sin breisson̅
Ar na wree diwe i̅ makaw a faß myr̅ gathfochlagan̅
Da Erygny mor gwbeig ȝone̅ sell dy bleigny sin breisson̅
In ny̅in ag toag breeda me̅na i̅ la̅vo neir̅ lwidda
E ȝa rair̅ ga di wee in bradda myr̅ wree gy̅ fane̅ gy̅ fy̅
Di holfe leith neir̅ leyr̅ royf ath a vagsin faa a doch broone
Di ȝrwine ygin i̅ nathi tre Inny hool harrocher̅
Mon̅ nvrchur̅ neir̅ vy̅ny̅ dail dy̅ wayir̅ is din vakawe
Dathre dalve da drath ȝile sin la̅ve a bree pissyᵗ
An la̅ve dollonyᵗ ann di barda ag wlling
Neir̅ leer̅ din var̅haß og our̅ nor od par̅ris in puissone
[marginal ?] Essin ag bree roak rawre Isse ag dook er do va̅nyin̅
Marg traa naᵗ dwryg ȝa Iig Inrow ni me̅a̅ si vakke
[marginal ?] r fag sin dilyr̅ da drath ȝil raȝiß in lanvola eggin
O harle wyl er moye clwmv̅n̅ dawnyᵗ dyᵗ ȝoo brone̅
Noyf enyᵗ ag ath ga ny̅n̅ myg ar fisse a la̅vo la̅veig
Is ȝayin cwng na claᵗ done tath dwlling pane si phresson
[marginal ?] Wille er si soig elle is feyvy̅ne na ir ny̅vy̅ne
[marginal s] Na vil ne solrs na soo oo ȝinee i̅ torsa thromsoo
In nabra ne henyᵗ dette ar i̅ ney̅ a oge vake
ffye ȝeefin trayf a hvyȝin tyig elle ne hakoygis
[marginal ?] A vaka a vaka misse tra heth i̅ teig ȝorcha soo
[marginal ? id] Di we dothwa̅nna ort an̅n̅ is fort ollonyᵗ ha̅nam
O sakkid is far̅ a ȝarve a ney̅n̅ erß in toge la̅wo
Na Kel orn̅ hy̅nathtyn ȝaa / Do wo̅rn y̅myᵗchree orn̅a
Losse in theil vor̅soo moyg as see hariß er dosse
Ma i̅ dyg ȝorcha no ȝeye a yr̅ chome̅ is kyn̅owin
Er linn erß i̅ la̅vo oge ga teiᵗ bronyᵗ a ven̅ od
Is leyr̅ ȝwne̅a ir neil solse na beig er hwe athorß
Er clathtin dagkirra da naᵗ doar̅ see soig bi evy̅na
Neir̅ ȝheß a ȝeoyg ȝreissour̅ ȝlan̅ er a vreisson foar̅ falloig
[marginal ?] Barrowle di varir̅ rown is di lanvo di wee si bresso̅n̅e̅
Iwth awai ka in cowlpla i̅ rai is bea phresson̅e̅
Re faksin neyryᵗ vᶜȝee flayis ag wil boon̅ ree
[marginal ? G] w soig broon̅e̅ beagi downi sloig a waa is pussone̅ni
[marginal ?] Ni we i̅ tolse soo in theil sacha mvrn̅ meif noachreig
Teif re dail is do wes dotht aᵗ myr̅ hollaß clar̅ choolle
Ta edd̅ noyf ny̅neyg graye is evy̅nis talvm tone̅van̅
A wille edd̅ oyf ȝorra ȝowf & tolchyᵗ i̅ nor̅ enyᵗg
Is far̅ na loß we lowe evy̅nis rißnatᵗ Inchur̅ri
Ne boone̅ Inve a mortborn so moet toyr̅ Inve in tolso honni
Torskal teyg neif as si vrow ard Angli
Go dee y̅ bra͘a͘ agis bea reiß neir̅ ree la͘ cac͘ a da͘ryß
Mac ny͘ cr̅ony er cho̅mis doyf ag neif ane̅ oar̅ ȝaly ȝin
Di legfi mee in macsin woy̅m er E ȝaksin i̅nane̅ oar̅
An tallow gin ne dig ȝee de reoksin er heoch neve
Is gin egsin downa ȝei ȝoif achmai er couliv a chealle
Eßacht re heanlaa noif is cwt din choal angli
Ni hoy̅ne is de roig ȝea fer̅roo choal ni cron̅y
Imny orrydycht o̅o̅ne veinn ag mak ney̅ eaym̅
Noᵗ cha leyr̅ ȝin ȝl ar̅ sin gowᵗ naᵗ saysycht in pa̅e̅n̅ phekkow
Imni i̅ neiffrin na ȝei nec da gwr̅ri fa choave ra nne
Sulla agis wllaa arda o vill voyve er i̅ arba a
Iffrin attryf ny̅ dawin pusovne deyr̅ rᵗ i̅ dwloyin
Rothtni Ilsean̅ treal dy̅ tyg ymkane̅ oraan̅ one̅ rehyg
Da vesteis fir i̅ do̅yin Sthaile Iffrin Ior̅ chor̅r̅
Re clastin di bi choor̅ Sthanma dave is gin agsin Iffrin
Di bi neof la ginach ann bas da͘wail is ne aywȝinin
Ne dul ne tar̅now is ste browᵗ gin Invrowᵗ aithin
[marginal x] Mynna gyᵗ gooß acht a ȝaw losk ann is Imbaath y
Smaal blayth na baᵗsee lotht Snaath naᵗ traufe tessytht
Ige wrch achtyg heyinin pest a ter̅ ter̅ßchee Iffrin
Da vaig e Ig ryerk i̅ fer a chee is cwntwirt
Erow Iffrin nar̅ vakka ma͘ a gaynaa vog na vagsyᵗ
[marginal ?] Re ny̅ nowle ga cvnni di cher̅re̅ si downa a ville gov
Ne treß er dea an du̅na tran̅ na i̅ botht di veiß na hir̅ran
Ne lair̅ tanna teyr er noif far̅ri a har̅re gi hail ȝean̅
Cree vr̅issil owle tig dee dwnna ȝer̅ dow
is loyeit is loir̅ dir̅ goylleȝeit oyere is a̅gil
Bea gin eiß gin vrchur̅ // doyve er soyna i̅nygyrra
Slanta gy̅ orkill d̅row faltee cholkin carddwoil
Muak a chreikfee teeg neif er ir̅ mvian bregginne
Ca hard naᵗ beil a wooᶜ in sseil it morg a wallis
Nar̅ Waltyr̅ ma ter mvrra lor̅ y̅ ȝenid i dey ȝoe
Goe oye woir̅ri is lor̅ lym̅ oyg is glor̅woir̅ri ȝoeym̅
Corle mvr̅re moi̅ra di ne mak ni mor̅ oye
layni treß i̅ oig noy ne ȝle meß me vanma / moig margit
Ergeik
Ag s

challe gave Coane̅ a reiß ir meilsyᵗ
Merfaid con dut a leith a booᵗ ag cog on voyn v
challe wa dan eadma chinfeir̅ gow taik neiß mow
Vssit vic veiᵗgyᵗ gleik heg a fit fa thre sin loo
A fit fa doaris di chraw gi braa na be re sloo
fulling a froo di chaᵗ & cac fein di haich loo
Mag va̅ ny̅ nan vᶜlor̅ sen akkil su la̅ne doo
A vuk a var̅ vir̅ ȝe ve gin Skeiß di ȝowyr̅ ee arestil boo
Mir sen veis a ven ga ȝaninn far er a too
Huggi a raac V C me lowyᵗ ȝa far fenyᵗ

etʅ Autor huius Cochondyᵗ MᶜKerla wo
Tesß mvr̅ chroyᵗin clone̅ freiᵗ Ca stoyg noᵗ cha stoyg sa
[marginal B] Growny̅ skea mayn leiᶜ mlaye raany̅ glaic
Tosß mur̅ᵗ hawryᵗ oliß lynn o chavle gar̅ es gow slaß
Caghyr̅ waaa char̅ wllgil crone̅ in mir̅ raa cwoi̅ in awro
Tosßmvr̅ chassil fa chosß na i̅ dow̅now g͘lasßin fea ȝ
Er orr vlg gren̅ nale glasß gw m͘aß cwrk dow
Neir̅ ȝaw moyve na cork na conc̅ porc er nar̅ hawyᵗ

A houd̅ so Duncha Mor̅ be voe Lawenacht
Mark dwnna a cayl a ȝoo agis ga vil schrow di ȝanna
Agis na ead gawal loa & nac͘ ool wea no hawe
Agis nac͘ synni cor̅ri na port & nac͘ gaive gy̅ locht leye
Agis nac͘ skur̅re di chrwt veynni & naᵗ synni mir̅ is meynni
As marg nac͘ skur̅ da dryng drang agis di rann di, ray
Agis na cluntyr̅ a chrut & nac͘ tuggi̅ a ȝawn
As marg na toyr̅ toye da chael is nac͘ cu̅mn̅ a feyn slan̅
As marg a ver̅ traß gi treg ar a veß na rig a lave
Da be mo vea̅n̅ annsyᵗ veß neach soygin a ȝrab go had
Di ȝor̅fin i̅ cranni fa vonni ga bea neach er a cur̅ mergmn

A houd̅ so gillecrist talȝr etc bod in stuyk
Bennyᵗ di hylyᵗ a threnoite a ree phar̅ris port nyn layk
Di hylyᵗ neir̅ ȝann dit ȝoe how fein di ȝalve vlli ead
Is dutti di chommi seil nawȝoe di ȝroy͘ derk er da ny̅ sow
Ir a ve̅nyᵗ port is pobbil malyᵗ di lucht coggi cwlli
A ta chonvrt curst chwllan̅ danew wlk er clannow reicht
Gyn glwnnvm ayr̅ in genn gvnniᵗ is lane̅ gi glenni dulli ȝeive
A lucht cogge er clanni awȝoe onac͘ fadir̅ vea nane̅ dost
Na geltow a chew ra chael / fertew ree ny̅ grein a gork
A luc͘t cogge er clan awȝoe di fre lucifeir̅ ny̅ lwbe
Na leg foiß na dein dy̅ drongsoo losk / a re nyᵗ solsi sowd
Er eeß eith chappil clawyᵗ nar̅is lane dy̅ choynnyᵗ chwlle
Wer̅rit wpe i̅ nucht nyᵗ selga legge brwct a melga moe
Mallit͘ nyᵗ selga is a wor̅loye deeß eith keiᵗryᵗ is chrwe
Di chur̅ drwine ra foyd nyᵗ foiche skeiltir̅ kinni a ȝaßre ȝoe
A ta gaßre vaddi vaßlaic Er layr̅ Inche ald art
lane truddyr̅ Eed treg a threnoit / Cur̅seir̅ eed a venoit valk
Ga ȝemmi crakkin chon alta agin vm clar̅si is vm chrute
Cha terga clakin foyr̅ fallwe aggin on choynni aalle vlk
Yr̅ crist dan sneicht seachin o loc͘ chabbir̅ gow ryn frewiᵗ
loyᵗ a gonnil da gorpe knawe orthis olk a raiᵗ reveit͘
gon ga ner̅rik sen er scher̅chw di vakrobert ny̅ royt tee
A lac͘ venour̅ ni glenni gust is lenour̅ kenn crist er claa
A vil o vinni ȝulbin ȝrenta di vaddrow sooß goshrow tolve
Fissi er selgew sissi a soig derk ayr̅ o crist vlli orve
gi glwnny̅ is me i̅ ny̅vir̅ nissa meilchon skeilli ny̅ skonni
Marg ma nea balle ni bokneac͘ gon dea gallyr̅ tutmyᵗ trommi
Stawyᵗ connyᵗ elsi is aggait er lucht varve ni grey glaß
Mak dey lai chre noy nawelyᵗ gyᵗ sneath a choyn an̅vyᵗ ass
loska gi sywe hay scheiᵗ chellin a oone stewart ny̅ stead braafe
May ber woym ger shreyth schranwoor̅ a choyn ȝra̅ni ȝra̅vor̅
Er ȝar̅ri oyone̅ steadȝil stewart cha learroiᵗ cabbir̅ gy̅ chenn
Is eed er cha͘llew caß corryᵗ a choyn nire ȝlassi vongi hoenni
